description: Replacement and installation of windows to front and side elevations; external alterations
decision_conditions: Notwithstanding the approved plans, the front bay window (ground floor) shall accurately replicate, in terms of profile and detailing, the original windows surviving to the existing ground floor bay window. Any trickle vents (factory finished white) shall be concealed, all glazing shall be no greater than that specified on the approved plans list, in total thickness.

The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the window frames hereby approved shall be of softwood timber with hardwood cills, Georgian bars, ovolo putty, only,  the windowpanes shall be double glazed.

The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans: Location Plan dated received 02-05-2023;Existing and Proposed Elevations Plan entitled Drawing No: 23/17BC/01Aâ€™Casement Windows W1 Elevations entitled Drawing No: 01/02;Casement Windows W1 Details entitled Drawing No: 02/02;Casement Windows W2 Elevations entitled Drawing No: 01/02;Casement Windows W2 Details entitled Drawing No: 02/02;Casement Windows W3 Elevations External entitled Drawing No: 01/05;Casement Windows W3 Elevations Internal entitled Drawing No: 02/05;Casement Windows W3 Details 1 entitled Drawing No: 03/05;Casement Windows W3 Details 2 entitled Drawing No: 04/05;Casement Windows W3 Details 3 entitled Drawing No: 05/05;Casement Windows W4 Elevations entitled Drawing No: 01/02;Casement Windows W4 Details entitled Drawing No: 02/02;Casement Windows W5 Elevations entitled Drawing No: 01/02;Casement Windows W5 Details entitled Drawing No: 02/02;Casement Windows W6 Elevations entitled Drawing No: 01/02;Casement Windows W6 Details entitled Drawing No: 02/02;Heritage Statement prepared by Tim Harris dated June 23rd, 2023;

The
development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three
years from the date of this permission.
